Html:
Dear developer:

I create a project using dynamic data display dll ,when I am using the function like v0.2/PerfCounterSample  it shows a chart dynamicly,but I found the points out of screen will be clear when the time pass.

I don't want to clear the out of screen points ,so when user drag the screen they can see the data which are generated hours ago.something like in v0.3/SimulationSample ,shows, while this example show all the data points in one screen shot,it means the x axes will automatically shrink for the display of chart.I want the x axes don't change the size while.

how can I make the chart as I described?

Thanks!
